meanings.definition: With the arms bent and hands on the hips.

meanings.sent2: He walked kimbo, showing his confidence.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled kimbo, trying to look serious.

meanings.sent5: The superhero landed kimbo after a successful flight.
